# Smartria (SmartRIA)

## Overview
- **Website:** https://smart-ria.com
- **Category:** RIA Compliance Software
- **Description:** Cloud-based proactive compliance management platform for medium to enterprise RIAs and networks. Built by an RIA for RIAs, offering centralized compliance management, trade monitoring, vendor management, and employee oversight.
- **Status:** Active
- **Last Updated:** 2026-02-12

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Price (Annual) | Price (Monthly) | User Limit | Key Features |
|------|----------------|-----------------|------------|--------------|
| Custom | Contact for pricing | Contact for pricing | Unlimited | Customized pricing designed to fit firm's size, complexity, and growth stage. Includes all compliance features, integrations, and support. |

### Notes on Pricing
- **Pricing Model:** Customized pricing based on firm size, complexity, and growth stage. No publicly disclosed pricing tiers.
- **Free Trial:** Not specified (likely demo available).
- **Enterprise Pricing:** Available for large firms; requires consultation.
- **Contact:** hello@smart-ria.com, 833-497-6278 (sales).

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities
- **Compliance Management:** Centralized compliance program management, policy/procedure documentation, audit-ready storage.
- **Trade Monitoring:** Employee trade monitoring with automated feeds, front-running detection, configurable alerts.
- **Vendor Management:** Due diligence tracking, risk assessments, performance reviews.
- **Employee Oversight:** Onboarding workflows, annual attestations, outside business activity reporting, code of ethics sign-off.
- **Client Annual Reviews:** Automated tracking and documentation.
- **High Cash Balance & Trading Inactivity Alerts:** Proactive risk detection.
- **Customizable Workflows:** Automated workflows for compliance tasks.

### Advanced Features
- **Automated Onboarding:** Self-service dashboards, automated training workflows.
- **Real-Time Risk Alerts:** Instant risk detection and clear reporting.
- **SOC 2 Type II Certified:** Data security and privacy.
- **SSO Integration:** Support for identity management solutions.
- **White Labeling:** Custom logos, styles, domain names.
- **Branch Management:** Multi-office support and reporting.

### Enterprise Features
- **Centralized Oversight:** Unified view across multiple offices.
- **Advanced Compliance Tools:** Automated archiving, detailed audit trails, supervision workflows.
- **Scalable Architecture:** Enterprise-grade infrastructure.
- **Customizable Workflows:** Firm-specific process mapping.

### Limitations
- **Pricing Transparency:** No public pricing; requires sales consultation.
- **API Documentation:** Limited public documentation; may require account access.
- **Industry Focus:** Designed specifically for RIAs; may not suit other industries.

## Add-On Products & Services

### Smartria Pro Platform
**All-in-One Compliance Platform for RIAs**

- **What it does:** Comprehensive compliance tool addressing four areas: clients & accounts, operations & records, employee trade monitoring, employee onboarding.
- **Key Features:**
  - Centralized dashboard with compliance calendar.
  - Automated workflows and reminders.
  - Trade monitoring with Altruist integration (automated employee trade monitoring).
  - Vendor management with due diligence tracking.
  - Customizable access controls and audit-ready storage.
- **Pricing:** Included in custom pricing.

### Professional Services
- **Compliance Consulting:** Partners with top compliance consulting firms.
- **Managed Services:** Implementation support, training, monthly health checks, quarterly check-ins, priority support.
- **Custom Professional Services:** Custom compliance solutions for unique situations.

## Integrations

### Integration Overview
- **Total Integrations:** 7+ confirmed (additional integrations likely available).
- **Integration Categories:** CRMs, Custodians, Financial Data Aggregators, Portfolio Management, Compliance Tools.
- **Integration Types:** Native integrations, API integrations, webhooks (likely available via API).

### Key Integrations (Confirmed)

#### Black Diamond Wealth Platform (Portfolio Management)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Direct connection between Black Diamond data within SmartRIA, enabling 360-degree view of client households for compliance surveillance.
- **Data synced:** Client data, account information, positions, performance data.
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (requires configuration).
- **Limitations:** Requires Black Diamond subscription.
- **Documentation:** https://smart-ria.com/blog/sscs-black-diamond-wealth-platform-and-smartria-announce-integration-partnership-to-streamline-compliance-surveillance/

#### BridgeFT (Financial Data Aggregation)
- **Type:** API Integration
- **Direction:** One-way (data feed from BridgeFT to SmartRIA)
- **What it does:** Automated data flow of custodial data feeds (Schwab, TD Ameritrade, etc.) into SmartRIA, eliminating manual data management.
- **Data synced:** Account and household data, held-away assets.
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (requires API integration).
- **Limitations:** None specified.
- **Documentation:** https://www.bridgeft.com/smartria-uses-bridgeft-wealthtech-api-to-power-real-time-compliance-recommendations/

#### Altruist (Custodian)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Automated employee trade monitoring using Altruist data (accounts, households, positions, transactions) for trade confirmation collection and early detection of ethical/front-running concerns.
- **Data synced:** Account data, household data, positions, transactions.
- **Setup complexity:** Medium (contact Smartria customer service).
- **Limitations:** Requires Altruist account.
- **Documentation:** https://altruist.com/company-insights/integration-with-smartria/

#### Plaid (Financial Data Aggregation)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** One-way (data feed)
- **What it does:** Enables monitoring of held-away accounts for trade compliance and Code of Ethics enforcement.
- **Data synced:** Account data, transaction data.
- **Setup complexity:** Medium.
- **Limitations:** None specified.
- **Documentation:** Mentioned on Smartria platform page.

#### Redtail CRM (CRM)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Synchronization of client data between Redtail CRM and SmartRIA for compliance workflows.
- **Data synced:** Client records, contact information.
- **Setup complexity:** Medium.
- **Limitations:** Requires Redtail CRM subscription.
- **Documentation:** https://smart-ria.com/company/integrations-and-partners/

#### Salesforce CRM (CRM)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Integration with Salesforce CRM for client data synchronization.
- **Data synced:** Client records, contact information.
- **Setup complexity:** Medium.
- **Limitations:** Requires Salesforce subscription.
- **Documentation:** https://smart-ria.com/company/integrations-and-partners/

#### Wealthbox CRM (CRM)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Integration with Wealthbox CRM for client data synchronization.
- **Data synced:** Client records, contact information.
- **Setup complexity:** Medium.
- **Limitations:** Requires Wealthbox subscription.
- **Documentation:** https://smart-ria.com/company/integrations-and-partners/

### Integration Types Available
- **Native Integrations:** Direct platform-to-platform connections (most common).
- **API Integrations:** Custom integrations via Smartria API (likely available).
- **Webhooks:** Likely supported via API (details not publicly documented).

### Integration Categories
- **CRMs:** Redtail, Salesforce, Wealthbox.
- **Custodians:** Altruist, Schwab, TD Ameritrade (via BridgeFT).

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros
- **Industry-Specific Design:** Purpose-built for RIAs with compliance in mind.
- **Comprehensive Compliance Platform:** Trade monitoring, vendor management, employee oversight, client reviews.
- **Strong Integrations:** Native integrations with major custodians, CRMs, data aggregators.
- **Automation Focus:** Automated workflows, risk alerts, real-time reporting.
- **SOC 2 Type II Certified:** Security and compliance certifications.
- **Customizable Workflows:** Tailored to firm's unique processes.
- **Enterprise-Ready:** Multi-office support, centralized oversight, scalable architecture.
- **User-Friendly:** Clean interface, intuitive design.
- **Customer Support:** U.S.-based support team.

### Cons
- **Pricing Transparency:** No public pricing; requires sales consultation.
- **Limited Public API Documentation:** Barrier for custom development.
- **Industry Lock-In:** Specifically designed for RIAs; may not suit other industries.
- **Add-On Services Complexity:** Professional services may incur additional costs.
- **Integration Details Scarce:** Full integration list not publicly documented.
- **Free Trial:** Not clearly advertised.

### Alternatives
- **Redtail CRM:** CRM with compliance features.
- **Wealthbox CRM:** Modern CRM with compliance add-ons.
- **RIA in a Box:** Comprehensive compliance platform.
- **Orion Compliance:** Compliance tools within Orion ecosystem.
- **SS&C Compliance Solutions:** Enterprise compliance software.
- **Salesforce Financial Services Cloud:** General CRM with compliance customization.

### Use Cases

#### Ideal For:
- **Mid-sized to Enterprise RIAs** seeking comprehensive compliance platform.
- **RIAs using Altruist custodian** wanting integrated trade monitoring.
- **Firms needing automated employee onboarding** and compliance workflows.
- **RIAs with multiple offices** requiring centralized oversight.
- **Compliance consultants** managing multiple client firms.

#### Not Ideal For:
- **Solo advisors** (pricing may not be cost-effective).
- **Non-RIA firms** (industry-specific).
- **Firms requiring extensive public API documentation** (limited developer resources).
- **Firms on tight budgets** without need for comprehensive compliance.

### Key Differentiators
1. **Compliance-First Design:** Built specifically for RIA regulatory requirements.
2. **Native Custodian Integrations:** Direct integration with Altruist and other custodians.
3. **Automated Trade Monitoring:** Real-time detection of ethical violations.
4. **Vendor Management:** Centralized due diligence tracking.
5. **Enterprise Scalability:** Multi-office support and branch management.
